com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal

Class YRCThemeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCThemeManager

  • public class YRCThemeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Theme manager class that stores all registered themes and provides utility methods to obtain font and colors for the current theme.
    See Also:
    YRCTheme
